column1: 3.  When  the  matter  was  taken  up  for  inquiry  on  21st  October  2024,  the  Respondent

Republic of Sri Lanka…”: Attorney-at-Law pleaded guilty and entered a plea in mitigation supported by Affidavit
dated 16th October 2024. As the Respondent has pleaded guilty, I do not see it necessary
for this Court to exhaustively address the facts of the matter except insofar as it is relevant
